form.subject: prime?(p) segfaults - libalgebra
form.description:
prime?(p: %): Partial(Boolean) == is implemented in IntegerCategory
But when used as: %12 >> tw:Partial(Bool) := prime?(17) () @ Partial(Bool) Comp: 0 msec, Interp: 110 msec %13 >> retract(tw) Program fault (segmentation violation).Program fault (segmentation violation). %13 >> tw () @ Partial(Bool)
